All other plugins that use the glue info plugin also don't work anymore (the VO list in the grid project view, the glue information browser, glogin, jsdl jobsubmission, maybe others). All throw the same ClassCastException. Changing the severity to critical.

I've added a logException call for the case that loading the cache file fails. It seems that it fails every time on my machine. I get following exception:

I've added Nicholas to the CC since he checked in the last version of the plugin.

Your change is correct, the code was originally auto-generated but now it is maintained manually. When did this start happening? It is odd that loading the cache fails on your machine every time. ( Should I enquire about the  the obvious "permissions"?)

I guess you are refering to the /.metadata/.plugins/eu.geclipse.info/.gridinfo file in the workspace directory of the geclipse runtime, right? I have checked the permissions on that file and there should be no problem. I did not change anything from the time it still worked to time it stopped working (at least nothing I could think of) (I just startet g-Eclipse as I have done before and the GlueInfo stopped working)
Unfortunately I can not test this right now, since I won't be able to access the machine on which this problem occurred for a few weeks.
Since Nikos is the responsible person for the Info System from now on i am attaching this bug to him.
